name: Temple Complex
description: A vast temple complex serves as the center of religious worship and political power, offering spiritual guidance and social services, but the religious authority can be both benevolent and oppressive. The combination of faith and politics creates opportunities for both spiritual and temporal advancement.
atmosphere: Multiple temple buildings surround sacred courtyards where priests conduct elaborate ceremonies. Incense and offerings fill the air while pilgrims gather around holy altars. The architecture displays divine symbols and religious artwork. Sacred pools and prayer gardens provide contemplative spaces.
